review.comment_positive: I loved that the bungalows were surrounded by a beautiful garden with fruit trees and that there were may tours to choose from.

An exceptional accomodation in the heart of the Mekong Delta, owned by a family that will run the extra mile to make you feel comfortable. They will help you in every way possible: arrange transfers, arrange trips, sharing tips and trips, laundry service, whatever you want really. They also have a restaurant where they serve you delicious food and ice cold drinks. The perfect stay does exist, thank you Daniel & Jeeny for your great hospitality!
review.comment_negative: Everything was perfect!
